column5: [font size="1" color="#FF0000"]LAST EDITED ON Apr-06-01 AT 08:25AM (CST)[/font][p]I am looking for a tiller 16',17',18'. Just sold mine and I am in the market for another.Price range various with type of boat($0-$14000.00) With or without a motor. Post or email me direct. Thanks in advance.Oh ya, I am from saskatoon.
